text: Abb farishton ney kaha aey loot! Hum teray perwerdigar kay bhejay huye hain na mumkin hai kay yeh tujh tak phonch payen pus tu apney ghar walon ko ley ker kuch raat rahey nikal khara ho. Tum mein say kissi ko murr ker bhi na dekhna chahaiye ba-juz teri biwi kay iss liye kay ussay bhi wohi phonchney wala hai jo inn sab ko phonchay ga yaqeenan inn kay waday ka waqt subha ka hai kiya subha bilkul qarib nahi
